data.comment: Rotherham make their first substitution with Florian Jozefzoon replacing Kieran Sadlier.
In the minute 42, Preston's Daniel Johnson has been booked in Rotherham.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Rotherham.
In the minute 53, Rotherham take a 1-0 lead thanks to Richard Wood.
Jayden Stockley is replacing Emil Riis Jakobsen for Preston at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
The away team replace Scott Sinclair with Tom Barkhuizen.
In the minute 67, Paul Warne is making the team's second substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with Matt Crooks replacing Kyle Vassell.
Paul Gallagher is on a sub for Darnell Fisher for Preston.
Ryan Ledson is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 84, Michael Ihiekwe (Rotherham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Matt Crooks.
Angus MacDonald is replacing Matthew Olosunde for the home team.
The match has come to a close in Rotherham. The final score is 2-1.
Joe Rafferty (Preston) has received a first yellow card.
